blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

title: Hogwarts survivor mood board
body:
Hogwarts survivor oc male.
a mood board + writing 

word count: 637

Dear mother

 i am writing this letter from one of the corridors that survived the battle of Hogwarts covered in dirt and he blood of my class mates.There is not any need to worry any more Voldemort is dead.Gone for what i hope is for ever and i am fine -obliviously since i am writing this letter to you- a few scratches and small wounds,however i fear the mental wounds from what i have seen and been apart of will be harder to heal. 

A number of my friends the people i have known since i was young the people who grew up with me lay dead in the main hall next to countless other dead bodies,do not be fooled  i am not as innocent as you think. mother.. i have killed people- people with no morals or care for those of whom they killed but people none the less- i have there blood on my hands.

mother i miss you and father so much and can not wait to walk up the familiar stone path that leads to our cottage like house, my body longs to walk through that wooden front door into your waiting arm,embraced by your warmth,something i have not felt in what feels like a long time.But i am afraid i will not be coming home just yet. i need time to find myself again, to morn the lose of friends, the loss of innocent lives and to explore the world to finally get the freedom to do as i please something that was taken away from me and the rest of the students.

there is one thing you must know mother as to why i need to be alone maybe then i wont get a letter back from you arguing for me to come home that you could help me but you cant mother only i can help myself.

there were dead men by mass production- in one country after an other- family’s that were not apart of this world month after month.

Dead men in such familiar promiscuity that they become monotonous.

Dead men in such monstrous infinity that you almost come to hate them.

dead bodies thrown about scattered along the corridors.dead bodies scattered outside with all types of wounds there soulless eyes stared at you as you ran as you continued to fight. and even though you hated the thought you were glad   so glad that it want you laying there, glad that you got to go home glad that you could continue fighting.

these are the things that you at home need not even try to understand. to you there are and always will be just names of students printed in the paper, names of children you will hear as you walk down the street for you they will always be just people you  who went away and just didn't  come back. you did not see them lying so grotesque and pale laying in the rubble of the home you once knew. we saw them saw them by the multiple by the hundreds that is the difference.

however  enough talk about death i have talked and seen enough of it to last a life time.my first stop on my exploration around the world is Greece. i can not tell you how exited i am to swim in their beautiful clear water. after that i think ill head to Australia or Rome not to sure yet, however i am aiming to see both of those places.i will continue to write about my journey and collect a number of things for you and father.

if you ever need me i’m just an owl away and will be home a soon as i can 

 i will see you soon and can not wait to be home again.

much love from your son xx

summary: I’m looking for some new blogs to follow! If you post any of the following, please like/reblog this post and I’ll check your...
body:
I’m looking for some new blogs to follow!

If you post any of the following, please like/reblog this post and I’ll check your blog out!

  • Harry Potter
  • Red Rising
  • Grishaverse/Leigh Bardugo
  • Alice Oseman
  • V E Schwab
  • Jay Kristoff
  • Doctor Who
  • Bookish stuff in general (especially YA/fantasy/science fiction) - I have a soft spot for merch, book hauls and shelfies
  • Writing advice
  • Writing memes/jokes
  • Writing resource/reference materials (infographics, masterlists, etc)
  • If you’re the kind of person who writes literal essays analysing, criticising and interpreting your favourite books, then I love you and must read your rants immediately

caption:
He was looking the dark corridor. A silhouette was walking alone. He approached her without any hesitation.

<<Miss Weasley, out for a walk in the moonlight ?>> murmured when he was right behind her.

The girl turned scared and looked at him.

<<Professor Snape I …>>

<<Are you going to sabotage the Carrows again?>> Asked her and a ironic smile was drawn on his face.

<<Me…  no.  I’ve never done it and I’ll never will>>Ginny said while see was touching her pockets.

He looks at her. She knew he was suspicious.

<<Stupid girl>> he thought <<don’t you know that you are in real danger when you sabotage them>>

<<Detention Weasley>>

Ginny looked at him with hatred.

<<But, I haven’t done anything. You can not accuse me for something that I haven’t …>>

<<You talk back?>>

<<But…>>

<<Silence>>

<<Look I denied to get punished for something that I haven’t done.>>

<<Come with me now>>

<<Severus, is there a problem?>>  they heard a woman’s voice in the dark.

Suddenly behind Ginny appeared Alecto Carrow. The deatheater who was teaching them Muggle studies.

<<No, Alecto>> Snape said.  He sounded like he wasn’t very pleased seeing her. <<Just miss Weasley she denieds to accept…>>

<<I haven’t done anything to be punished. And I thought that you couldn’t be worse then what you already were. >>

Snape looked her in the eyes.

<<How dare speak to your superior like that. You filthy traitor. Crucio>> screamed Alecto.

Ginny fell on the ground and start writhe. At the same time she was trying to hold her screams .

<<Enough Alecto> Said Snape.

Alecto continues like he never spoke.

<<Enough>> Screamed Snape and Alecto stopped.

<<She needs to be punished Severus. She has to learn to obey. >>

Ginny tried to sit up but she couldn’t.

<<Crucio>> Alecto screamed again.

<<I thought I said enough>> Snape said for a third time.

Alecto stopped and looked at him.

<<Very well I am leaving her to you.>> she said and left.

Snape stooped calmly over Ginny who she was still trembling.

<<Are you all right?>> Asked her calmly while he put his hand on her shoulder.

<<Don’t touch me>> Ginny whispered

Snape took her in his arms. Her face was wet from sweat and tears.

<<I said don’t…>>

<<Stop it Weasley>> Snape said.

He looked her right arm which had a wound.

<<What did you had in your pockets?>>

Ginny looked at him.

<<Don’t tell me that you suddenly care? A moment ago you were about to punish me for something that I never did.>>

<<I just need to know what cause this wound>>

<<I had a little jar. It obviously broke. Now can I get back to my dormitory? >>

Snape noticed in her eyes abhorrence. But there was something else too. Something like weakness. No, he knew that Ginny Weasley was one of the bravest and strongest students in Hogwarts. But right now, in his eyes she was fragile.

He took her arm, he pulled his wand and he whispered a spell. Suddenly the wound disappeared like it never existed.

He squeezed her for a little, and he caress her long red hair. Ginny was hearing his heart beating and a warmth enfold her. A warmth that scared her.

<<All right thank you. I will get back to my dormitory now.>>

Snape stopped caressing her hair and he left her from his arms. Then he stood up and he gave his hand to Ginny. Ginny ignored him and she stood up on her own, but she stumbled and she was about to fell again if Snape hadn’t pull her towards him with a result to fell in his arms again.

She looked at him and without knowing why she approached her face to his.

<<Well I will accompany you to your dormitory.>> Said Snape calmly.

<<Yes>> Said Ginny dazed.

They were walking without hurry to the Gryffindor Common Room.

<<What is wrong with me? >> Ginny thought.

At the light of her wand she was able to see a sardonic smile upon Snape’s face.

<<Potter taught all of you well how to  saunter during the night. Such a same, I thought that the Weasleys were smarter than that but I guess I was wrong.>>

<<Shut it>>

<<Excuse me what did you said?>>

<<nothing>>

<<I can hear him even in the way you talk.>>

<<He never told us to do anything. If you want to speak in a bad way about someone speak for me not for someone who is trying to save us from Voldemort. Two years ago when you were in the Order I thought that I can trust you but I can see that I was wrong. And I’ve never been so wrong in my whole life except for when I trusted Riddle on my first year. >> She said in anger.

She passed him by and she run away. Once more her eyes were filled with tears. She turned to a corner but there was Amycus waiting for her.

<<Well, what do we have here?>> Amycus said and he grabbed her from her wrist. <<Miss Weasley>> he continued and he pushed her against the wall. <<What are we going to do with you Now that the mouse got caught? What did you did this time?>> He said while he was approaching his face to hers close enough so Ginny was able to smell his filthy breath.

<<I haven’t done anything>>

<<You dare lie to me? >> He said and he slapped her with force.

Ginny fell on the ground.

<<Crucio>> Amycus screamed.

<<Please… please stop it>>

<<But you have to consider yourself lucky.  If Greyback was here you would have been his dinner. >>

<<Amycus>>

Amycus turned.

<<Severus, I caught her wandering>>

<<Amycus I would prefer to inform me before you punish a student. >>

<<I just wanted to give her a lesson>>

<<I know and I don’t disagree, but now I take over. Thank you>>

He approached Ginny and he forced her to stand up while he was grabbing her from her shoulders. She wasn’t able to stand.

<<Hold on just for a little bit>> She heard Snape’s voice in her head.

Ginny was surprised.

<<Well Amycus you can go now. Be certain that she is going to get punished.>>

<<Very well! Goodnight.>>

Amycus left and Snape relaxed his handles. Ginny leaned on him. She was feeling safe.

<<Weasley can you walk?>>

Ginny shook her head negatively. She leaned on the wall behind her and then she inflected her knees and she shitted down.

Snape was looking at her with a sad look in his eyes.

<<Don’t tell me now that you are feeling bad for what happened to me tonight.>>

Snape smiled. He approached her and he shitted beside her.

<<Who else is out tonight?>

Ginny wasn’t sure if she had to tell him or not. In the end she decided to tell him.

<< Luna and Neville.>>

<<Let’s find them before the Carrows>> Snape said hastily.

Ginny couldn’t believe her ears.

Snape help her to stand. Then they start running in the corridors. They saw Neville ready to through a stinky bomb out of Snape’s office.

<<Neville no>>  

Neville turned and looked at them. He hastily hide the stinky bomb away when he saw Snape.

<<What is it? What happened?>>

<<Well! Your plan failed and we decided to find you before the Carrows if that’s ok with you Longbottom>>

<<And why did the headmaster caught you Ginny?>>

<<I was careless tonight Neville.>>

<<That’s ok. What is going to be our punishment?>>

<<You specifically Longbottom go and find Lovegood. Now>>

Neville left.

<<Who’s idea was that Weasley?>>

<<Mine>>

<<Well, you shouldn’t be proud of it. Firstly it failed and secondly we are not going to leave sooner from Hogwarts in that way. >>

<<I’ll never stop fighting you. You have never been in our place. We are getting punished because we choose not to punish first year students. Even if you hadn’t kill Dumbledore I am sure that you would care more to save yourself first. You wouldn’t even try to go against them and to put your life in danger. Am I wrong? I wonder why I keep talking to you. And why I trusted you again. >>

Snape grabbed her from her arm, he pulled her against the wall behind her and he approached his face to hers. His eyes were sparkling with anger in the darkness.

<<You are hurting me>>

<<Guess what Weasley. You don’t know everything for me. You speak without knowing what I went through. And believe me we don’t compare. You cannot know what I loose from my life that leads me here. I have done things that I regret and that you cannot even imagine.>> Said Snape with anger.

He drawled back. Ginny was feeling bad for what she said. It was true that she knew almost nothing for that man. She looked at him. It was the first time she saw him so angry.

Neville and Lune came back.

<<You are not going to get punished tonight. But if you do that again I won’t cover you>>

<<I didn’t get to Luna on time. She had already through the stinky bomb.>>

<<Useless as always Longbottom . Go to your dormitories. Now. And don’t sheer. I’ll find out. >>

The three children left quickly.

<<Ginny, what happened?>> Luna asked.

<<Well he must be suspecting us for a while.>>

<<How do you know?>> Neville asked

<<He knew where I was. I was far from Amycus’s office>

<<Well goodnight.>> Luna said

<<Goodnight>> Said Neville and Ginny at the same time.

Ginny was thinking. He saved me twice tonight and I was awful to him. I shouldn’t spoke to him that way. I shouldn’t have lost my temper. And what if he isn’t that bad? No that’s now possible he is a Deatheater and he killed Dumbledore. Although he helped us tonight.

<<Ginny do you hear me? What are we going to do tomorrow?>> she heard Neville talking.

<<We are not going to do anything.>>

<<What?

<<We have to be careful. And even if we like it or not I owe to Snape.>>

<<Why?>>

<<He saved me twice tonight and he didn’t punished us.>>

<<That doesn’t mean that you owe him just because he made a favor.>>

<<Yes but the result is the same he saved me.>>

<<Actually, he did what he had to do as a headmaster of this school. He protected you. But don’t you see? I am pretty sure that he is trying to take us with his side. He just doesn’t want to have problems with You- Know-Who. It is obvious. He is just trying to save himself. He doesn’t care for us at all. Of course if you want to stop getting out at night I understand but don’t tell me he has regret for what he did. >>

Even if you hadn’t kill Dumbledore I am sure that you would care more to save yourself first. You wouldn’t even try to go against them and to put your life in danger. Am I wrong? I wonder why I keep talking to you. And why I trusted you again. >>

Snape grabbed her from her arm, he pulled her against the wall behind her and he approached his face to hers. His eyes were sparkling with anger in the darkness.

<<You are hurting me>>

<<Guess what Weasley. You don’t know everything for me. You speak without knowing what I went through. And believe me we don’t compare. You cannot know what I loose from my life that leads me here. I have done things that I regret and that you cannot even imagine.>> Said Snape with anger.

He drawled back. Ginny was feeling bad for what she said. It was true that she knew almost nothing for that man. She looked at him. It was the first time she saw him so angry.

Neville and Lune came back.

<<You are not going to get punished tonight. But if you do that again I won’t cover you>>

<<I didn’t get to Luna on time. She had already through the stinky bomb.>>

<<Useless as always Longbottom . Go to your dormitories. Now. And don’t sheer. I’ll find out. >>

The three children left quickly.

<<Ginny, what happened?>> Luna asked.

<<Well he must be suspecting us for a while.>>

<<How do you know?>> Neville asked

<<He knew where I was. I was far from Amycus’s office>

<<Well goodnight.>> Luna said

<<Goodnight>> Said Neville and Ginny at the same time.

Ginny was thinking. He saved me twice tonight and I was awful to him. I shouldn’t spoke to him that way. I shouldn’t have lost my temper. And what if he isn’t that bad? No that’s now possible he is a Deatheater and he killed Dumbledore. Although he helped us tonight.

<<Ginny do you hear me? What are we going to do tomorrow?>> she heard Neville talking.

<<We are not going to do anything.>>

<<What?

<<We have to be careful. And even if we like it or not I owe to Snape.>>

<<Why?>>

<<He saved me twice tonight and he didn’t punished us.>>

<<That doesn’t mean that you owe him just because he made a favor.>>

<<Yes but the result is the same he saved me.>>

<<Actually, he did what he had to do as a headmaster of this school. He protected you. But don’t you see? I am pretty sure that he is trying to take us with his side. He just doesn’t want to have problems with You- Know-Who. It is obvious. He is just trying to save himself. He doesn’t care for us at all. Of course if you want to stop getting out at night I understand but don’t tell me he has regret for what he did. >>
trail.content:
He was looking the dark corridor. A silhouette was walking alone. He approached her without any hesitation.

<<Miss Weasley, out for a walk in the moonlight ?>> murmured when he was right behind her.

The girl turned scared and looked at him.

<<Professor Snape I …>>

<<Are you going to sabotage the Carrows again?>> Asked her and a ironic smile was drawn on his face.

<<Me…  no.  I’ve never done it and I’ll never will>>Ginny said while see was touching her pockets.

He looks at her. She knew he was suspicious.

<<Stupid girl>> he thought <<don’t you know that you are in real danger when you sabotage them>>

<<Detention Weasley>>

Ginny looked at him with hatred.

<<But, I haven’t done anything. You can not accuse me for something that I haven’t …>>

<<You talk back?>>

<<But…>>

<<Silence>>

<<Look I denied to get punished for something that I haven’t done.>>

<<Come with me now>>

<<Severus, is there a problem?>>  they heard a woman’s voice in the dark.

Suddenly behind Ginny appeared Alecto Carrow. The deatheater who was teaching them Muggle studies.

<<No, Alecto>> Snape said.  He sounded like he wasn’t very pleased seeing her. <<Just miss Weasley she denieds to accept…>>

<<I haven’t done anything to be punished. And I thought that you couldn’t be worse then what you already were. >>

Snape looked her in the eyes.

<<How dare speak to your superior like that. You filthy traitor. Crucio>> screamed Alecto.

Ginny fell on the ground and start writhe. At the same time she was trying to hold her screams .

<<Enough Alecto> Said Snape.

Alecto continues like he never spoke.

<<Enough>> Screamed Snape and Alecto stopped.

<<She needs to be punished Severus. She has to learn to obey. >>

Ginny tried to sit up but she couldn’t.

<<Crucio>> Alecto screamed again.

<<I thought I said enough>> Snape said for a third time.

Alecto stopped and looked at him.

<<Very well I am leaving her to you.>> she said and left.

Snape stooped calmly over Ginny who she was still trembling.

<<Are you all right?>> Asked her calmly while he put his hand on her shoulder.

<<Don’t touch me>> Ginny whispered

Snape took her in his arms. Her face was wet from sweat and tears.

<<I said don’t…>>

<<Stop it Weasley>> Snape said.

He looked her right arm which had a wound.

<<What did you had in your pockets?>>

Ginny looked at him.

<<Don’t tell me that you suddenly care? A moment ago you were about to punish me for something that I never did.>>

<<I just need to know what cause this wound>>

<<I had a little jar. It obviously broke. Now can I get back to my dormitory? >>

Snape noticed in her eyes abhorrence. But there was something else too. Something like weakness. No, he knew that Ginny Weasley was one of the bravest and strongest students in Hogwarts. But right now, in his eyes she was fragile.

He took her arm, he pulled his wand and he whispered a spell. Suddenly the wound disappeared like it never existed.

He squeezed her for a little, and he caress her long red hair. Ginny was hearing his heart beating and a warmth enfold her. A warmth that scared her.

<<All right thank you. I will get back to my dormitory now.>>

Snape stopped caressing her hair and he left her from his arms. Then he stood up and he gave his hand to Ginny. Ginny ignored him and she stood up on her own, but she stumbled and she was about to fell again if Snape hadn’t pull her towards him with a result to fell in his arms again.

She looked at him and without knowing why she approached her face to his.

<<Well I will accompany you to your dormitory.>> Said Snape calmly.

<<Yes>> Said Ginny dazed.

They were walking without hurry to the Gryffindor Common Room.

<<What is wrong with me? >> Ginny thought.

At the light of her wand she was able to see a sardonic smile upon Snape’s face.

<<Potter taught all of you well how to  saunter during the night. Such a same, I thought that the Weasleys were smarter than that but I guess I was wrong.>>

<<Shut it>>

<<Excuse me what did you said?>>

<<nothing>>

<<I can hear him even in the way you talk.>>

<<He never told us to do anything. If you want to speak in a bad way about someone speak for me not for someone who is trying to save us from Voldemort. Two years ago when you were in the Order I thought that I can trust you but I can see that I was wrong. And I’ve never been so wrong in my whole life except for when I trusted Riddle on my first year. >> She said in anger.

She passed him by and she run away. Once more her eyes were filled with tears. She turned to a corner but there was Amycus waiting for her.

<<Well, what do we have here?>> Amycus said and he grabbed her from her wrist. <<Miss Weasley>> he continued and he pushed her against the wall. <<What are we going to do with you Now that the mouse got caught? What did you did this time?>> He said while he was approaching his face to hers close enough so Ginny was able to smell his filthy breath.

<<I haven’t done anything>>

<<You dare lie to me? >> He said and he slapped her with force.

Ginny fell on the ground.

<<Crucio>> Amycus screamed.

<<Please… please stop it>>

<<But you have to consider yourself lucky.  If Greyback was here you would have been his dinner. >>

<<Amycus>>

Amycus turned.

<<Severus, I caught her wandering>>

<<Amycus I would prefer to inform me before you punish a student. >>

<<I just wanted to give her a lesson>>

<<I know and I don’t disagree, but now I take over. Thank you>>

He approached Ginny and he forced her to stand up while he was grabbing her from her shoulders. She wasn’t able to stand.

<<Hold on just for a little bit>> She heard Snape’s voice in her head.

Ginny was surprised.

<<Well Amycus you can go now. Be certain that she is going to get punished.>>

<<Very well! Goodnight.>>

Amycus left and Snape relaxed his handles. Ginny leaned on him. She was feeling safe.

<<Weasley can you walk?>>

Ginny shook her head negatively. She leaned on the wall behind her and then she inflected her knees and she shitted down.

Snape was looking at her with a sad look in his eyes.

<<Don’t tell me now that you are feeling bad for what happened to me tonight.>>

Snape smiled. He approached her and he shitted beside her.

<<Who else is out tonight?>

Ginny wasn’t sure if she had to tell him or not. In the end she decided to tell him.

<< Luna and Neville.>>

<<Let’s find them before the Carrows>> Snape said hastily.

Ginny couldn’t believe her ears.

Snape help her to stand. Then they start running in the corridors. They saw Neville ready to through a stinky bomb out of Snape’s office.

<<Neville no>>  

Neville turned and looked at them. He hastily hide the stinky bomb away when he saw Snape.

<<What is it? What happened?>>

<<Well! Your plan failed and we decided to find you before the Carrows if that’s ok with you Longbottom>>

<<And why did the headmaster caught you Ginny?>>

<<I was careless tonight Neville.>>

<<That’s ok. What is going to be our punishment?>>

<<You specifically Longbottom go and find Lovegood. Now>>

Neville left.

<<Who’s idea was that Weasley?>>

<<Mine>>

I wonder why I keep talking to you. And why I trusted you again. >>

Neville and Lune came back.

<<I didn’t get to Luna on time. She had already through the stinky bomb.>>

The three children left quickly.

<<Goodnight>> Said Neville and Ginny at the same time.
